data.actual_result: User avatars occasionally flicker between the loaded avatar and default avatar multiple times
data.expected_result: User avatars may show the default avatar once before loading, or just load
data.short_description: User avatars occasionally flicker between the user avatar and default avatar multiple times when switching servers
data.steps_to_repro: - Force close and reopen Discord so servers are not loaded - Slowly switch between servers, observing the user avatars in chat each time - Note: Make sure there are several avatars visible, so you can observe easier
